paragraph1: I'm Yuval, a Full Stack Developer passionate about building modern web experiences. I create clean, fast, and scalable web applications that are both functional and enjoyable to use.
paragraph2: As a freelancer, I've worked with diverse clients, building everything from elegant business websites to complex full-stack applications. My previous internship experience sharpened my teamwork skills and ability to deliver projects on time.
paragraph3: I believe in writing maintainable code and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies. I combine technical expertise with problem-solving skills to craft web experiences that make a real impact.
hero_text: Building modern web experiences and technological solutions that drive business growth
tech_text: Modern technologies I use to build exceptional web experiences

additional_note: ...and much more! Every project is unique, and I'm always excited to tackle new challenges.
